TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeArrayIndexerExpression extends System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

Docs.summary: Represents a reference to an index of an array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression> can be used to represent a reference to an index of an array of one or more dimensions. Use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIndexerExpression> for representing a reference to an index of a code (non-array) indexer. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression.TargetObject%2A> property indicates the indexer object. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression.Indices%2A> property indicates either a single index within the target array, or a set of indexes that together specify a specific intersection of indexes across the dimensions of the array.
## Examples The following code creates a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression> that references index 5 of an array of integers named `x` :
[!code-cpp[CodeArrayIndexerExpressionSnippet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeArrayIndexerExpressionSnippet/CPP/codearrayindexerexpressionsnippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CodeArrayIndexerExpressionSnippet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeArrayIndexerExpressionSnippet/CS/codearrayindexerexpressionsnippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CodeArrayIndexerExpressionSnippet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeArrayIndexerExpressionSnippet/VB/codearrayindexerexpressionsnippet.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the index or indexes of the indexer expression.
Docs.value: A that indicates the index or indexes of the indexer expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection> can contain a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> that specifies a single index within the target array, or multiple <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> objects that together specify a specific intersection of indexes across the dimensions of the array.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the target object of the array indexer.
Docs.value: A that represents the array being indexed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property typically contains either a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableReferenceExpression>, a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression>, or a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression>.
